hadiths.text: It was narrated that:Rafi bin Khadij said: “I heard the Messenger of Allah say: 'The person who is appointed to collect the Sadaqah - who does so with sincerity and fairness is like one who foes out to fight for the sake of Allah, until he returns to the house.' ”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي عُمَّالِ الصَّدَقَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the collectors of Zakat
